name: DAMU²
description:
DAMUDAMU.

The Fijian word for Red.

Growing up, I was always taught to be humble and to look for the best in people, to learn to appreciate it, even if it is a small thing.

Those two lessons have greatly influenced my life and has led my work to express themes of Abstraction and Minimalism. 

Sometimes art doesn't have to mean something to make us smile. Sometimes the little things are enough. 

I feel this piece best represents that.
